author: customer
text: I emailed costumer service on Thursday 2/24 about an item was not as described. I have yet to hear back from anyone.
title: No response from Costumer Service

author: customer
text: The item I purchased looked nothing like the photo on the website. Item was described in much better condition that it was received. Its as if the colors were adjusted in the photo to make it appear less faded and damaged. It looks so horrible I won't even be able to carry this bag. I am so disappointed.
title: The item I purchased looked nothing…

author: customer
text: Shipping is expensive and arrived late!
title: Expensive shipping

author: customer
text:
3 out of 4 products didn’t much with the size! 
One was broken and in the pictures and web didn’t tell!
Disappointed
title: Not good

author: customer
text: no one has gotten back to me, its been 12 days
title: no one has gotten back to me

author: customer
text: Not what I ordered And smelly
title: Not what I ordered And smelly

author: customer
text: I am getting an email about my opinion, but the item I ordered was set to arrive yesterday but it has not arrived yet. It is still a few states away and no shipping updates.
title: slow and costly shipping. Inaccurate delivery date

author: customer
text: There were stains all over it
title: There were stains all over it

author: KC
text: The pair of Gucci shoes I ordered were described as "pristine." The pictures also indicated they were brand new. However, they arrived dirty and with a huge green stain right on the toe. Not sure who "inspected" these before they went out, but they should get some glasses. Completely unacceptable and I won't be ordering from TheRealReal again. I'll stick with Fashionphile next time--at least they're honest!
title: The pair of Gucci shoes I ordered were…

author: Alan Brown
text: Returned 2 of 3 items. Notably, the John varvatos cardigan was severely "pilled" and ragged from being overly washed
title: Returned 2 of 3 items

author: Eleanor
text: I did not receive my product. The real real has been very understanding and helpful but I have not heard from them about what is going on. Honestly just not an ideal scenario, but I do wish action was taken quicker.
title: I did not receive my product

author: Ellen
text:
Communication is virtually non existent!!  Your team continues to post misleading or inaccurate descriptions of my consignment items.  A sweatshirt is listed as a sweater and as expected was purchased, then returned.  A RAEY camo jacket is listed as an evening jacket!!  And items that match are never pictured together.  I really don’t know if I will continue consigning with you.
I am not alone in this sentiment.
title: Always disappointed

author: Dr Ronnie Goines customer
text: No one ever called me! I waited & waited, but no call. I’m glad I received an opportunity to rate my experience. I received the wrong shirt I was trying to get the correct one shipped to me
title: No one ever called me

author: Sophronia Gilbert
text: I’m questioning the authenticity of the purse. The leather is hard, the zipper is hard as the flow of the zipper appears to be one that’s been replaced both zippers might I add. Very disappointed for a $1000+ knock off. Will never order again
title: I’m questioning the authenticity

author: customer
text: Package arrived at wrong address
title: Poor quality

author: customer
text: Horrible. The item I purchased is in terrible condition. Stains everywhere. Some not pictured. Other that were in the picture look like someone edited the photo to reduce the appearance of some of the stains. Very disappointed. I will be contacting customer service.
title: Horrible.

author: customer
text: Dirty shoes- no effort to clean them. I can see the previous owners FOOT SKIN on the inside of the shoes. I’m disgusted. This is my first purchase on the Real Real and my last.
title: Disgusting

author: customer
text:
dropped off clothing to be consigned 6 weeks ago, i was told it would take 2 -3 weeks for the items to be posted by multiple
people. the items are still not for sale on the site.
title: dropped off clothing to be consigned 6…

author: kcosby
text: bag is nice - but the odor (damp basement smell) coming from my bag. this was not disclosed in the description. This was my first purchase with your company and you have lost my trust as a consumer. Because of the non-disclosure of the odor, I questioned if the bag was authentic.
title: bag is nice - Didn't tell me about the odor

author: customer
text: It was not clear that the items I purchased were final sale. It isn't listed on the order confirmation or the invoice, but the clothes are still tagged as final sale. Also, the pictures on the site are difficult to determine the shape and even style details on the clothing. I doubt that I'll purchase again.
title: Not Worth It
